search.getBooks: const dom = arguments[0]; const bookList = dom.getElementsByClassName('mySearch')[0].getElementsByTagName('ul'); const books = []; for(const el of bookList){ const lis = el.getElementsByTagName('li'); const _name = lis[0].getElementsByTagName('a')[0].text(); const _latestChapter = lis[1].getElementsByTagName('a')[0].text(); const _author = lis[2].text().replace('作者：', '').trim(); const _href = lis[0].getElementsByTagName('a')[0].href(); books.push({ name:_name, author:_author, href:_href, latestChapter: _latestChapter }); } return books ;

info.getInfo: const dom = arguments[0]; return { name: dom.getElementsByClassName('bookTitle')[0].text(), author: '佚名', latestChapter: dom.getElementsByClassName('panel-body')[0].getElementsByTagName('p')[1].getElementsByTagName('a')[0].text().trim(), intro: dom.getElementById('bookIntro').text().trim(), tocUrl:'localUrl' }

toc.getTocList: const dom = arguments[0]; const eleList = dom.getElementsByClassName('panel-body')[1].getElementsByTagName('dd'); const tocs = []; for(el of eleList){ const a = el.getElementsByTagName('a')[0]; tocs.push({ name: a.text().trim(), href: a.href() }); } return tocs;
